jcr:root.jcr:description: Donâ€™t crash! Really though, you have nothing to worry about. Remember how when you started skiing you most likely had someone connect your skis together so you could plow down the mountain and learn how to stop? You just need to first learn how to use your heels to stop on your board (this is where you will probably fall over a few times) and then everything else will come naturally.
